name: CEM-Cosmos: A Field-Theoretic Model of ConsciousnessCoupled to Energy-Flow Cosmology
description: This preprint presents CEM-Cosmos, a theoretical framework unifying cosmology, psychology, and artificial intelligence through thermodynamic principles. Ego is modeled as a local entropy minimum stabilizing identity, while the mirror term formalizes recursive feedback enabling self-modeling.
